subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Scat Daddy, the winner of the Florida Derby, was retired from racing because of an injured tendon in his right foreleg. In his last start, Scat Daddy, trained by Todd Pletcher, finished 18th in the Kentucky Derby on May 5. The tendon injury was discovered after a workout June 10. Scat Daddy won five of nine races.
